bio:
After his graduation in Computer Science at the Politecnico di Milano,
Davide started to work on several JEE projects using for the most part
EJB3, Hibernate, Seam and JBoss AS.

Davide's interest in open source technologies and continuous
integration has guided him to become a contributor on leading open source
projects such as Hibernate Search, Arquillian and ShrinkWrap.
name: Davide D'Alto
